channel.title: Merriman Lab Notebook on MerrimanLab
channel.description: Recent content in Merriman Lab Notebook on MerrimanLab

item.title: It's alive!
item.description: Hello Thanks to Riku there is now going to be a place to collect together a series of How-Tos and other tid-bits of knowledge that will be useful for people in the lab. Future Once enough posts have been create Riku has also volunteered to be editor of bookdown version of the posts. Enjoy!

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
